lines.text: Laws of motion apply to center of mass
Shifting center of mass creates floating illusion

secText:
Essential Question:
How is the center of mass of an object affected by movement and collisions?

Enduring Understandings:
1. The [OBJ:expsec_g668:center of mass] is the [OBJ:expsec_g669:average location of mass of an object].
2. Apply physics principles such as [OBJ:expsec_g670:motion], [OBJ:expsec_g671:momentum], and [OBJ:expsec_g671:velocity] to an object's center of mass.
